title: Pure Ice
description: When the going gets tough, the tough play hockey...Landon Turner puts everyone else first and has dedicated his life to caring for his quadriplegic brother while working his butt off at his full-time job. There’s nothing easy about his existence, but all that might change when he meets a glamorous coworker who makes him realize how much he’s sacrificed. And then he gets the opportunity of a lifetime—to try out for his hometown city’s pro hockey team. For a man who has always dreamed of more than his blue-collar job, Landon finds himself having to choose between the life he desperately wants and the life he’s destined to have.Makeup artist and beauty guru Hannah Heatley can perfect a smoky eye and rock red lipstick like nobody’s business, but she can’t seem to give her own life the makeover it needs. After growing up in the shadow of her overbearing, wildly famous mother, Hannah has had enough drama to last a lifetime. Now she’s determined to get her personal life in order and finally pursue her real passion. Too bad she doesn’t know exactly what that is yet.Landon and Hannah don’t know if happily-ever-after exists, but in a city like Red Valley, anything can happen…
author: Rachelle Vaughn
